# Z-Flow - Complete Business Information
# Engineering Studio Berlin | MVP Development, n8n Automation & AI Integration

================================================================================
## COMPANY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

Z-Flow is a software agency and engineering studio based in Berlin, Germany. We help startups, SMEs, and the German Mittelstand build digital products and automate business processes.

**Founder**: Mahmoud Sheikh Alard
**Location**: Berlin, Germany
**Markets served**: Germany, Austria, Switzerland (DACH region), International (English-speaking)
**Company type**: Z-Flow UG (haftungsbeschränkt)
**Address**: Menzelstraße 3, 12157 Berlin, Germany

**Core expertise**:
1. MVP Development for startups
2. Workflow automation with n8n and Make.com
3. AI integration (OpenAI, Claude, custom LLM solutions)
4. No-code development (WeWeb, Xano, Supabase)

================================================================================
## SERVICES IN DETAIL
================================================================================

### 1. MVP DEVELOPMENT

**What we offer**:
We build Minimum Viable Products (MVPs) for founders and startups who want to validate their business idea quickly without spending months in development.

**Who it's for**:
- Non-technical founders who need a technical partner
- First-time founders validating a startup idea
- Companies launching new digital products
- Entrepreneurs seeking "fractional CTO" or "CTO as a service"

**Technology options**:
- **Code-based**: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Node.js
- **No-Code**: WeWeb (frontend) + Xano or Supabase (backend)

**What's included**:
- Complete web application
- Responsive mobile-first design
- User authentication system
- Database architecture
- API development
- Deployment and hosting setup
- Full documentation
- After-launch support (bug fixes included)

**Timeline**: 2-6 weeks depending on scope
**Price**: Starting from €15,000 (fixed price after discovery phase)

**Keywords**: MVP development agency, MVP entwickeln lassen, build MVP for startup, MVP Agentur Deutschland, MVP development Berlin, startup MVP development, fractional CTO, CTO as a service, technical cofounder alternative

---

### 2. WORKFLOW AUTOMATION (n8n & Make.com)

**What we offer**:
We automate repetitive business processes using n8n and Make.com, saving companies up to 90% of time on manual tasks.

**Who it's for**:
- Businesses with repetitive manual processes
- Companies wanting to connect multiple tools/apps
- Teams drowning in data entry and manual reporting
- Organizations seeking GDPR-compliant automation

**Platforms we use**:
- **n8n**: Open-source, can be self-hosted for maximum privacy/GDPR compliance
- **Make.com**: Cloud-based, 1000+ app integrations, visual builder

**Common automation use cases**:
- Lead management and CRM automation
- Invoice processing and financial workflows
- Document workflows and filing
- E-commerce order processing
- Data synchronization between tools
- Reporting and dashboards
- Customer onboarding automation
- Email automation workflows

**What's included**:
- Workflow analysis and design
- n8n or Make.com implementation
- API integrations and webhooks
- Error handling and monitoring
- Documentation and training
- 30 days post-launch support

**Timeline**: 1-3 weeks
**Price**: Starting from €3,000

**Keywords**: n8n developer, n8n Entwickler, n8n automation expert, n8n freelancer, Make.com expert, Make.com Experte, workflow automation services, Prozessautomatisierung, business process automation, Zapier alternative, GDPR compliant automation

---

### 3. AI INTEGRATION SERVICES

**What we offer**:
We integrate AI capabilities into existing business systems and workflows, helping companies leverage AI for real productivity gains.

**Technologies we work with**:
- OpenAI API (GPT-4, GPT-4 Turbo)
- Claude API (Anthropic)
- 11Labs (voice AI)
- LangChain for complex AI pipelines
- RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) systems
- Vector databases (Pinecone, Supabase)

**AI use cases we implement**:
- AI-powered chatbots for customer support
- Document analysis and extraction
- Content generation (product descriptions, emails)
- AI voice agents for phone support
- Automated categorization and tagging
- Meeting transcription and summarization
- Custom GPT/AI assistants trained on company data

**Our AI principles**:
- AI is not an end in itself - we only use it where it provides measurable value
- Privacy-first: European or self-hosted solutions when needed
- Explainable AI: You understand what the AI does
- Human-in-the-loop: AI supports but doesn't replace human decision-making

**Keywords**: AI integration services, KI Integration, OpenAI API integration, ChatGPT integration, LLM integration developer, AI chatbot development, KI Beratung, Claude API developer, RAG implementation, AI for business

---

### 4. NO-CODE DEVELOPMENT

**Platforms we specialize in**:

**WeWeb** (Frontend):
- Visual web application builder
- Connects to any backend via API
- Custom logic and workflows
- Responsive design

**Xano** (Backend):
- No-code backend and database
- Visual API builder
- Built-in authentication
- Scalable infrastructure

**Supabase** (Backend alternative):
- PostgreSQL database
- Authentication
- Real-time subscriptions
- Edge functions

**Keywords**: WeWeb developer, WeWeb Entwickler, Xano developer, Xano backend developer, Supabase developer, no-code development agency, No-Code Agentur, low-code development

---

### 5. TRAINING & WORKSHOPS

**What we offer**:
Hands-on training tailored to your specific use case. Learn to build and maintain automation and no-code solutions yourself.

**Training topics**:
- n8n workflow automation
- Make.com scenario building
- WeWeb + Xano/Supabase development
- No-code stack architecture

**Format options**:
- Remote (video call)
- On-site (Germany, additional travel costs may apply)
- Half-day to multi-day workshops

**What's included**:
- Hands-on exercises with your real use case
- Best practices and architecture patterns
- Documentation and resources
- Follow-up Q&A session

**Timeline**: Half-day to multi-day
**Price**: Starting from €1,500

---

### 6. RETAINER / ONGOING PARTNERSHIP

**What we offer**:
Monthly development partnership for companies needing ongoing support, feature development, and maintenance.

**What's included**:
- Dedicated development hours
- Priority support
- Regular updates and maintenance
- Feature development
- Performance monitoring
- Monthly review calls

**Price**: Starting from €4,000/month

**Keywords**: fractional CTO Berlin, tech partner for startup, development partner, externer CTO, CTO als Dienstleistung

================================================================================
## PORTFOLIO / CASE STUDIES
================================================================================

### AI-Powered Marketing Video Generation
**Industry**: Media & Marketing
**Challenge**: Generate diverse video content from single images at scale
**Solution**: Airtable interface + n8n workflow + OpenAI + Ideogram
**Results**: 50+ videos/week, 90% reduction in production time

### AI Voice Agent for Customer Support
**Industry**: Construction
**Challenge**: Handle project status inquiries 24/7
**Solution**: 11Labs voice AI + n8n + Airtable
**Results**: 85% inquiries handled without humans, 40% satisfaction increase

### Automated Refund Processing
**Industry**: E-Commerce
**Challenge**: Process daily refunds faster without errors
**Solution**: Lexoffice + Airtable + Stripe + Make.com
**Results**: 30 seconds vs 15 minutes, 200+ daily refunds, zero errors

### Car Supplier Data Integration
**Industry**: Automotive
**Challenge**: Aggregate vehicle data from multiple suppliers
**Solution**: Make.com + PostgreSQL + Airtable + Bubble.io
**Results**: 500+ listings synced daily, 3 APIs unified

### Automated Invoicing System
**Industry**: Finance
**Challenge**: Complex invoicing with create, edit, cancel, reissue
**Solution**: n8n + Airtable with audit trails
**Results**: 95% reduction in errors, one-click operations

### Volunteer Management Platform
**Industry**: Non-Profit
**Challenge**: Complex onboarding with background checks
**Solution**: WeWeb + Xano with role-based permissions
**Results**: 80% faster onboarding, 50+ team members supported

### End-to-End Lead Pipeline
**Industry**: Sales & B2B
**Challenge**: Unified lead management across platforms
**Solution**: 14 n8n workflows + Airtable + Supabase + Smartlead + Heyreach
**Results**: Single source of truth, 70% faster lead response

## PRICING OVERVIEW
================================================================================

| Service | Starting Price | Timeline |
|---------|---------------|----------|
| MVP Development | €15,000 | 2-6 weeks |
| Automation (n8n/Make.com) | €3,000 | 1-3 weeks |
| AI Integration | Custom quote | Varies |
| Training/Workshop | €1,500 | Half to multi-day |
| Monthly Retainer | €4,000/month | Ongoing |

**Pricing model**: Fixed prices after discovery phase. No hourly rates, no surprises.
**Payment terms**: Typically 30% at start, 30% after design, 40% at delivery

## TECHNOLOGY STACK
================================================================================

**Automation platforms**:
- n8n (self-hosted and cloud)
- Make.com (formerly Integromat)

**Frontend development**:
- Next.js
- React
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- WeWeb (No-Code)

**Backend development**:
- Xano (No-Code backend)
- Supabase
- Node.js

**Databases**:
- PostgreSQL
- Supabase
- Airtable

**AI & Machine Learning**:
- OpenAI API
- Claude API (Anthropic)
- 11Labs (Voice AI)
- LangChain
- OpenRouter

**Deployment & Hosting**:
- Vercel
- Railway
- Self-hosted options available

================================================================================
## FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
================================================================================

**Q: How does pricing work?**
A: After a free consultation and discovery phase, you receive a binding fixed-price quote. No hourly rates, no surprises.

**Q: What's not included in the price?**
A: External costs like hosting, domains, or third-party tool licenses are separate. We advise on cost-effective options.

**Q: Do you offer payment plans?**
A: Yes, for larger projects. Typically 30% at start, 30% after design approval, 40% at handover.

**Q: Can I continue development myself after the project?**
A: Yes! Everything belongs to you. Full documentation, no vendor lock-in. You can continue development yourself or hire another provider.

**Q: Do you work with clients outside Germany?**
A: Yes, we serve international clients. English communication is standard.

**Q: What's the difference between n8n and Make.com?**
A: n8n can be self-hosted (better for GDPR compliance and data-sensitive workflows). Make.com is cloud-only but has more pre-built integrations.

**Q: What is a fractional CTO?**
A: A fractional CTO provides part-time technical leadership for startups without a full-time CTO. This includes architecture decisions, tech strategy, and team guidance.

**Q: How long does MVP development take?**
A: Typically 2-6 weeks depending on complexity. We work in weekly sprints with regular demos.

**Q: What technologies do you use for MVPs?**
A: Next.js and React for code-based solutions, or WeWeb + Xano/Supabase for no-code. We choose based on your needs and budget.
